title: Meet the ITU, the tech agency that helps the world communicate
itunes:title: Meet the ITU, the tech agency that helps the world communicate
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: Since 1865 a special agency, now part of the United Nations, has had a major influence on global communication standards. The International Telecommunication Union, or ITU, ensures tech from the telegraph to the internet plays nicely across international borders. Last week, ITU member states elected a new secretary-general, Doreen Bogdan-Martin. She’s an American and has worked with the agency for decades. Marketplace’s Kimberly Adams recently spoke with Mallory Knodel, chief technology officer at the Center for Democracy and Technology about the ITU’s history.
